mapper.select:
and t4.material_requisition_code like concat('%', #{materialRequisitionCode}, '%')
and ( t1.material_code like concat('%', #{item}, '%') )
and ( t1.material_name like concat('%', #{item}, '%') )
and t.creator_account in (#{item})
and t4.material_receiver in (#{item})
and ( t4.manufacture_order_code like concat('%', #{item}, '%') )
and t.in_out_stock_status=#{inOutStockStatus}
and t4.document_type=#{documentType}
and t4.creator_account in (#{item})
and t.material_requisition_item_sid in (#{item})
and t4.in_out_stock_status in (#{item})
and t.storehouse_sid =#{storehouseSid}
and t.storehouse_location_sid in (#{item})
and date_format(t4.demand_date,'%y%m%d') >= date_format(#{demandDateBeginTime},'%y%m%d')
and date_format(t4.demand_date,'%y%m%d') <= date_format(#{demandDateEndTime},'%y%m%d')
and t4.movement_type in (#{item})
and t4.handle_status in (#{item})
and t4.document_type in (#{item})
and date_format(t.create_date,'%y%m%d') >= date_format(#{beginTime},'%y%m%d')
and date_format(t.create_date,'%y%m%d') <= date_format(#{endTime},'%y%m%d')
GROUP BY t.material_requisition_item_sid order by t4.material_requisition_code desc

select t.quantity - sum(t2.quantity) from s_inv_material_requisition_item t left join s_inv_inventory_document_item t2 on t2.refer_document_item_sid = t.material_requisition_item_sid where t.material_requisition_item_sid = #{materialRequisitionItemSid} group by t.material_requisition_item_sid
